specs.title: Port Monolith Prototype to production index
specs.description: Establish the SOLEINVICTVS base index.html using the approved proto-1-monolith.html.

files.details: Overwrite the existing index.html with the contents of website_prototypes/proto-1-monolith.html. Ensure all sections, animations, and typography remain intact.

risks_and_notes: Operator still needs to provide ConvertKit setup, founder copy, and payment solution for the Vault products. C-005 only handles porting the approved design.
message_to_vitalic:
BUILD ORDER:
1. index.html — Copy the contents of website_prototypes/proto-1-monolith.html into soleinvictvs-web/index.html.

WATCH OUT FOR:
- The old index.html has different content. We are overwriting it entirely with the newly approved Monolith prototype.
- Leave existing files like codex.html as they are; they will be updated in subsequent specs.

DO NOT:
- Do not change the aesthetic. The Monolith direction is approved.

DONE WHEN:
- index.html opens in the browser and looks identical to proto-1-monolith.html, with all scroll animations functioning.
